page.title: 02Clubs for children in Oakley
page.content: Our Sunday School is held in the village hall every fortnight.It is run by several Mums.I go to Brownies at Oakley School every week.Mrs Coey is our Brown Owl.We do lots of badge work, sing songs and play games.Toddlers club is for Mothers with very young children.Here they get to know one another over a cup of tea.I belong to the Cub pack.There are twenty of us.Mr Culmer is our Akela.We have a hut where we meet each week.Sometimes we go camping.Oakley playgroup is held daily for children aged three to five. They do paintings,dressing up and play in the Wendy House.Junior youth club is for children aged eight to eleven.We meet our friends,play table tennis,snooker,and listen to records.
